sn22.3:1.2: ekam samayam ayasma mahakaccano avantisu viharati kuraraghare papate pabbate.
sn22.3:1.3: Atha kho haliddikani gahapati yenayasma mahakaccano tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam mahakaccanam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho haliddikani gahapati ayasmantam mahakaccanam etadavoca:
sn22.3:3.1: Imassa nu kho, bhante, bhagavata sankhittena bhasitassa katham vittharena attho datthabbo”ti?
sn22.3:5.2: Rupadhatuya kho, gahapati, yo chando yo rago ya nandi ya tanha ye upayupadana cetaso adhitthanabhinivesanusaya te tathagatassa pahina ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma.
sn22.3:5.7: vinnanadhatuya kho, gahapati, yo chando yo rago ya nandi ya tanha ye upayupadana cetaso adhitthanabhinivesanusaya te tathagatassa pahina ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma.
sn22.3:7.2: Rupanimittaniketavisaravinibandha kho, gahapati, tathagatassa pahina ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma.
sn22.3:7.8: dhammanimittaniketavisaravinibandha kho, gahapati, tathagatassa pahina ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma.
sn22.3:8.2: Idha, gahapati, ekacco gihihi samsattho viharati sahanandi sahasoki, sukhitesu sukhito, dukkhitesu dukkhito, uppannesu kiccakaraniyesu attana tesu yogam apajjati.
sn22.3:8.3: Evam kho, gahapati, game santhavajato hoti.
sn22.3:9.1: Kathanca, gahapati, game na santhavajato hoti?
sn22.3:9.2: Idha, gahapati, bhikkhu gihihi asamsattho viharati na sahanandi na sahasoki na sukhitesu sukhito na dukkhitesu dukkhito, uppannesu kiccakaraniyesu na attana tesu yogam apajjati.
sn22.3:9.3: Evam kho, gahapati, game na santhavajato hoti.
sn22.3:10.2: Idha, gahapati, ekacco kamesu avigatarago hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipaso avigataparilaho avigatatanho.
sn22.3:10.3: Evam kho, gahapati, kamehi aritto hoti.
sn22.3:11.2: Idha, gahapati, ekacco kamesu vigatarago hoti vigatacchando vigatapemo vigatapipaso vigataparilaho vigatatanho.
sn22.3:11.3: Evam kho, gahapati, kamehi ritto hoti.
sn22.3:12.3: ‘evamrupo siyam anagatamaddhanam, evamvedano siyam anagatamaddhanam, evamsanno siyam anagatamaddhanam, evamsankharo siyam anagatamaddhanam, evamvinnano siyam anagatamaddhanan’ti.
sn22.3:13.2: Idha, gahapati, ekaccassa na evam hoti:
sn22.3:13.3: ‘evamrupo siyam anagatamaddhanam, evamvedano siyam anagatamaddhanam, evamsanno siyam anagatamaddhanam, evamsankharo siyam anagatamaddhanam, evamvinnano siyam anagatamaddhanan’ti.
sn22.3:14.1: Kathanca, gahapati, katham viggayha janena katta hoti?
sn22.3:14.2: Idha, gahapati, ekacco evarupim katham katta hoti:
sn22.3:14.3: ‘na tvam imam dhammavinayam ajanasi; aham imam dhammavinayam ajanami. Kim tvam imam dhammavinayam ajanissasi? Micchapatipanno tvamasi; ahamasmi sammapatipanno. Pure vacaniyam paccha avaca; paccha vacaniyam pure avaca. Sahitam me, asahitam te. Adhicinnam te viparavattam. Aropito te vado; cara vadappamokkhaya. Niggahitosi; nibbethehi va sace pahosi’ti.
sn22.3:14.4: Evam kho, gahapati, katham viggayha janena katta hoti.
sn22.3:15.1: Kathanca, gahapati, katham na viggayha janena katta hoti?
sn22.3:15.2: Idha, gahapati, bhikkhu na evarupim katham katta hoti:
sn22.3:15.3: ‘na tvam imam dhammavinayam ajanasi …pe… nibbethehi va sace pahosi’ti.
sn22.3:15.4: Evam kho, gahapati, katham na viggayha janena katta hoti.
sn22.3:16.1: Iti kho, gahapati, yam tam vuttam bhagavata atthakavaggiye magandiyapanhe:
sn22.3:18.1: Imassa kho, gahapati, bhagavata sankhittena bhasitassa evam vittharena attho datthabbo”ti.
